name: Remote
Lore: 'Tshhhh. Tshhhh. Zap! ''Look...good against remotes is one thing. Good against the living, that''s something else.''',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy at any site. Moves like a character at normal use of the Force. Once during each of your control phases, may: Select one character present to be power or forfeit +1 for remainder of turn. OR Use 2 Force to cancel any seeker present.',
